abstract.t: This document presents a number of resource control requirements thatenterprise network administrators face. It also discusses how RSVPis being used, or considered, in order to address these requirements.This document is offered as input to the IETF 77 RSVP mini-BOF. Theauthors recommend that the IETF continues supporting RSVP as aStandards Track protocol and continue facilitating development ofnecessary RSVP extensions in the Standards Track.
